s:

s:
Apni pyari Ankhon Main Chupalo Mujhko"
Muhabbat tm Se He Churalo Mujhko"
Dhoop Ho Ya Sehra Tera Sath Chalenge Hum"
Yaqeen NA Ho To Azmalo Mujhko"
Tere Her Dukh Ko Seh Lenge Hans K Hum"
Apne Wajood Ki Chadar Bana Lo Mujh Ko"
Zindagi Bhi Tere Naam Kardi Maine"
Bas Chand Lamhe Seeny Se Laga Lo Mujhko...

st: True lines....
s:
True lines....
Kisi se shirf utna hi door hona,
Ki use apki ahmiyt ka ehsas ho jye.
Lekin kbhi itna bhi dur mt hona,
Ki vo apke bina jena sekh le.

s:
Aaj Usne Ek Baat Keh Ke
Mujhe Rula Diya.. 
.
Jab Dard Bardaasht Nahi
Kar
Sakte To Mohabbat Kyo Ki... ?

s:
Mohabbat ki daastan Sunane Aaye hain,
Tabaah krne k bad wo Pyar jatane Aaye hai
Aansu pochh liye the Humne kab ke
Magar wo fir se aaj hume Rulane Aaye hai..

st: टूटे हुए दिल को, संभलने की ....आस क्या रखिये
s:
टूटे हुए दिल को, संभलने की ....आस क्या रखिये
कितना खोया है ज़िंदगी में .... हिसाब क्या रखिये
चेहरे पे ग़म बिठा कर क्या मिलेगा दोस्तो,
अपने अज़ाब अपने हैं, औरों को ....उदास क्या रखिये

st: Kitna bhi chaho na bhool paoge hume
s:
Kitna bhi chaho na bhool paoge hume
Jitni door jaoge nazdeek paoge hume............!!!
Mita sakte ho toh mita do yaade meri
Magar kya sanso se juda kar paoge hume.....

st: Zindgi Haseen Hai
s:
Zindgi Haseen Hai 
Zindgi Se Pyar Karo,
!Hai Andhera To Kya,
Ujale Ka Intezar Karo,
!Wo Pal Bhi Ayega 
Jiska Intzar Hai Apko,
!Rab Par Bhrosa Or 
Waqt Par Aitbar Karo,

st: Laafzo me kya taarif karun aapki,
s:
Laafzo me kya taarif karun aapki, 
aap lafzo me kaise sama paaoge, 
jab log hamare baare me puchenege, 
meri aankho me jaanemaan sirf tum nazar aaoge.

st: Tum ko to JAAN se pyara bana liya
s:
Tum ko to JAAN se pyara bana liya
DIL ka sukon ankh ka TARA bana liya
Ab tum sath do ya na do ye tumhri MARZI
Hum ne to tumhe zindgi ka SAHARA bana liya..

st: "DEEP" Jalte jagmgate rahain,
s:
"DEEP" Jalte jagmgate rahain, 

Aap hum ko hum aap ko "YAAD" atey rahain 

Jab tak zindgi hai "DUA" hai hamari, 

Aap "PHOOLON" ki tarha muskrate rahain.!!

st: Nashili aankho se wo jab hamein dekhte hain,
s:
Nashili aankho se wo jab hamein dekhte hain,
hum ghabraakar ankhen jhuka leite hain,
kaun milaye unn ankhon se ankhen,
suna hai wo ankho se apna bana leite hai.

st: Saari umar tum ko pyar mile
s:
Saari umar tum ko pyar mile
|
Jo dil mai hai wo hazar baar
mile
|
Bichar jate hai milne ke bad
bhi kuch log
|
Jo kbhi na bichre aisa tumko
pyar mile..

st: कभी उसने भी हमें चाहत का पैगाम लिखा था
s:
कभी उसने भी हमें चाहत का पैगाम लिखा था
सब कुछ उसने अपना हमारे नाम लिखा था
सुना हैं आज उनको हमारे जिक्र से भी नफ़रत है
जिसने कभी अपने दिल पर हमारा नाम लिखा था

st: Saath na rehne se Rishte nahi tuta karte
s:
Saath na rehne se Rishte nahi tuta karte
Waqt ke hath se Lamhe nahi chhuta karte
Log kehte hain mera Sapna toot gaya…
Toot ti neend hai Sapne nahi toota karte.

st: Sabhi Tareef karty hain Meri shayri ki lekin..........
s:
Sabhi Tareef karty hain Meri shayri ki lekin..........

Kabhi koi nai sunta mere alfaz ki siski.

st: Pyar “INSAN” Se Karo Uski “Aadat” Se Nahi...
s:
Pyar “INSAN” Se Karo Uski “Aadat” Se Nahi...
“Rutho” Unki “Baato” Se Magar Unse Nahi...
.
“Bhoolo” Unki “Galtiya” Par Unhe Nahi..
Kyuki “Rishto” Se Badhkar Kuch Bhi Nahi .

st: Ek pal ki judai gawara na ..kar sake
s:
Ek pal ki judai gawara na ..kar sake
Aisa ishq hum dobara na ..kar sake
Zindagi bhar palat ke naa dekha kabhi
Hum fir v shikwa tumhara naa ..kar sake
Tune toh har kisi se dil laga ke dekha
Magr hum apne dil ko awara na ..kar sake
Jaan tak luta di un ke pyar mein magar
Ek "Dil" hi woh apna humara naa ..kar sake

st: Zamane mein aise bhi naadan hote hain..
s:
Zamane mein aise bhi naadan hote hain..
apni kashti le jaate hain jahan toofaan hote hain...
Kyon basaate ho unko dil mein ?..
jo dil ki basti mein chand dinon ke mehmaan hote hain ...!!

st: Gile shikwe na dil se
s:
Gile shikwe na dil se
Laga lena..!

Kabhi maan jana to
Kabhi manaa lena..!

Kal ka kya pata "hum ho na ho"

Jab mauka mile thoda
Hass lena aur hasaa dena

st: Saath tumhara dena hai,
s:
Saath tumhara dena hai,
aur saath tumhara paana hai..
Patthron ke is shehar mein,
kaanch ka ghar banana hai..
Aasmanon pe jo rishta bana, 
usey duniya mein nibhana hai...
Ek naam tumhara liknna hai,
ek naam humen ban jaana hai..
Kuchh baaten tum se karni hain,
kuchh dil ka haal sunana hai.. 
Chupke se jo mangi hai,
un duaaon mein tum ko paana hai,
Tum rooth ke mujh se mat jaao,
mujhe saath tumhara paana hai..
Tum lout ke wapas aa jaao,
mujhe zindagi tumhe banana hai ...!!

st: Door hain aap se toh koi ghum nahin,
s:
Door hain aap se toh koi ghum nahin,
door reh ke bhoolne waale hum nahin..
Roz mulaqaat na ho toh kya hua ?
aap ki yaad aap ki mulaqaat se kam nahin ...!!

st: Din, Mahinay, Salon ka HiSaab Nahi Aata Mujhe,
s:
Din, Mahinay, Salon ka HiSaab Nahi Aata Mujhe,
HaMesha Se HaMesha tak Saath tumHara Chahiye.

st: ना पीने का शौक था, ना पिलाने का शौक था,
s:
ना पीने का शौक था, ना पिलाने का शौक था,
हमे तो सिर्फ नझर मिलाने का शौक था,
पर क्या करे यारो, हम नझर ही उनसे मिला बैठे,
जिन्हे; सिर्फ; नझरो से पिलाने का शौक था !!

st: Jab bhi kisi ko kareeb paya hain...
s:
Jab bhi kisi ko kareeb paya hain...
Kasam khuda ki wahi dhokha khaya hain...
Kyun dosh dete hain hum kaanto ko...
Zakhm to humne phulo se hi paya hain...

st: Hum Woh Phool Hain Jo Roz Roz Nahi Khiltay
s:
Hum Woh Phool Hain Jo Roz Roz Nahi Khiltay
Yeh Wo Hont Hain Jo Kabhi Nahin Siltay
Hum Se Bichro Ge To Ehsas Hoga Tumhain
Hum Wo Dost Hain Jo Roz Roz Nahin Miltay..

st: Kitni kaatil hai ye...
s:
Kitni kaatil hai ye...
Zindagi ki aarZo..

Marr jaate hai log...
kisi par...
"Jeene k liye"

st: Phul ban kar muskurana hum jante hai,
s:
Phul ban kar muskurana hum jante hai,
Muskurake ghum bhulana hum jantehe,

Milke log khush hote hai to kya hua,
bina mile rishte nibhna hum jante hai.!!

st: देख कर उसको तेरा यूँ पलट
s:
देख कर उसको तेरा यूँ पलट
जाना,.....
नफरत बता रही है
तूने मोहब्बत गज़ब की थी.

st: Mohabbat kaisi bhi ho dosto. ..
s:
Mohabbat kaisi bhi ho dosto. ..
Sajda karna sikha deti hai. ...
Tanhaiyo me rona sikha deti hai. ...
Akele gum sum rehna sikha deti hai. ...
Aankhe nam ho fir b sabke liye hasna sikha deti hai. .
Haste haste rona sikha deti hai. ..
Jo kisi ne na sikhaya ho. ..
Vo mohabbat sikha deti hai. ...

st: Upar se gusa aur dil me pyr karte ho,
s:
Upar se gusa aur dil me pyr karte ho,

nazre churate ho or dil bekrar krte ho,

lakh chupalo duniya se,

mujhe pta hai k aap roz mera intazar karte ho..

st: Saans lene se bhi teri yaad aati hai,
s:
Saans lene se bhi teri yaad aati hai,
Har saans mein teri khushboo bas jati hai,

Kese kahoon ki saans se main zinda hoon,
Jab ki saans se pehle teri yaad aati hai

st: Ghalat Suna Tha Mohabbat Aankhon Se Hoti Hai,
s:
Ghalat Suna Tha Mohabbat Aankhon Se Hoti Hai,
Dil Toh Woh Bhi Le Jaate Hain Jo Palkein Tak Nahin Uthaate

st: Ye ishq bhi Nasha-e-Sharab jaisa hain
s:
Ye ishq bhi Nasha-e-Sharab jaisa hain
Kare to Marr jaye
chode to kidhar jaye!!!!

st: Hum toh fanaah ho gaye uskii ankhen dekh kar Ghalib,
s:
Hum toh fanaah ho gaye uskii ankhen dekh kar Ghalib, 
Naa janay woh Aainaa kiasay dekhte hogey ..

st: Kyun na gharoor karta mein apney aap pey…
s:
Kyun na gharoor karta mein apney aap pey…
Mujhe us ney chaha jis ka chahnay waly
hazaron the…!

st: Aarju ye nhi ki gam ka toofan tal jaye,
s:
Aarju ye nhi ki gam ka toofan tal jaye,
Fikar to ye hai aapka dil na badal jaye,
Kbhi mujhko agar bhulana chaho to,
Dard itna dena ki mera dam nikal jaye.

st: अपनी ज़ुल्फ़ों को सितारों के हवाले कर दो
s:
अपनी ज़ुल्फ़ों को सितारों के हवाले कर दो
शहर-ए-गुल बादागुसारों के हवाले कर दो

तल्ख़ि-ए-होश हो या मस्ती-ए-इदराक-ए-जुनूँ
आज हर चीज़ बहारों के हवाले कर दो

मुझ को यारो न करो रहनुमाओं के सुपुर्द
मुझ को तुम रहगुज़ारों के हवाले कर दो

जागने वालों का तूफ़ाँ से कर दो रिश्ता
सोने वालों को किनारों के हवाले कर दो

मेरी तौबा का बजा है यही एजाज़ 'अवि'
मेरा साग़र मेरे यारों के हवाले कर दो

st: Roz Tera intezar Hota Hai
s:
Roz Tera intezar Hota Hai
Roz Ye Dil Beqarar Hota Hai

Kaash K Tum Samajh Sakte K
Chup Rehnay Walo Ko B Kisi Se Piyar Hota Hai.

st: ना करना हमसे प्यार का फिर झुठा वादा..
s:
ना करना हमसे प्यार का फिर झुठा वादा..

माँगी है आज दुआ के तुझे भुल जाएँ हम.!!

st: Jaane kya baat hai usme, jo mujhe kisi aur me
s:
Jaane kya baat hai usme, jo mujhe kisi aur me
nazar nahi aati.
Kya kashish hai un aankhon me ki mai nazar
hataa nahi paati.
Kya hai jo har pal mujhe hairaan kiya karta hai,
Kya hai jo mai tasaboor se mita nahi paati.

st: Dard Hota h Magar Shikwa nahi karte
s:
Dard Hota h Magar Shikwa nahi karte
Kon kehta h Hum Wafa nahi Karte
Aakhir Q nahi Badalti Taqdir Meri
Kya Mere Chahne Wale Mere Liye DUA Nahi
Karte?

st: सुकून मिल गया मुझको
s:
सुकून मिल गया मुझको
बदनाम होकर,
आपके हर इक इल्ज़ाम पे
यूँ बेजुबान होकर...

लोग पढ़ ही लेंगें आपकी आँखों में मेरी मोहब्बत,
चाहे कर दो इनकार
अंजान होकर...

st: Hamare Ashk Mein Apka
s:
Hamare Ashk Mein Apka
Khwab Chhupa Hai.....
..
Hamari Khushi Mein Apka
Ehsas Chupa Hai.....
..
Tum Hamari Dastan Mein
Raho Ya Na Raho.....
..
Lekin Is Dil Mein Hamesha
Aapke Liye Pyar Chupa Hai.

st: Jisko Chaho Use Chahat Bata Bhi Dena,
s:
Jisko Chaho Use Chahat Bata Bhi Dena,
Kitna Pyar He Usse Ye Jata Bhi Dena,
Ki Kahi Dil Uska Kahi Aur Na Lag Jaye,
Karke Izhar Uske Dil Ko Chura Bhi Lena,
Galti Se Bhi Ruthe Kabhi To Use Mana Bhi
Lena,
Ki Bahut Haseen Hota Hai Ye Pyar Ka Rishta,
Ki kabhi galti se bhi isey tod na lena .

st: Mafi mangna yeh zahir nai karta,
s:
Mafi mangna yeh zahir nai karta,
Ki ap galat or dosra sahi hai Balkay,
Yeh zahir karta hai ki,
Ap ko rishton ki ehmiyat,
Ap ki aan say barh kar hai!

st: Talaash kar dekho meri mOhabbat kO apne dil
s:
Talaash kar dekho meri mOhabbat kO apne dil
mein,
Dard hO tO samjh lena ke mOhabbat ab bhi
baki hai..!

st: Shikayat Kya Karon Dono Taraf Gham Ka
s:
Shikayat Kya Karon Dono Taraf Gham Ka
Fasana Hai,
Mere Aage Mohobbat Hai Tere Aage Zamana
Hai …!!

st: Jazbaat Mere Kahi Kuch Khoye Hue Se Hain,
s:
Jazbaat Mere Kahi Kuch Khoye Hue Se Hain,
Kahu Kaise Wo Tumse Thoda Sharmaye Hue Se
Hain,
Par Aaj Na Rok Sakunga Jazbato Ko Mai Apne,
Karte Hai Pyar Hum Tumhi Se Par Ghabraye
Hue Se Hain.

st: Hai Itni Mahobbat Mujhe Tumse Ki,
s:
Hai Itni Mahobbat Mujhe Tumse Ki,
Alfaazo Me Bhi Tum Ise Pa Na Paoge,
Agar Na Ho Yakeen To Aazma Ke Dekho,
Tum Khud Ko Bhi Itna Chah Na Paoge,
Mai Wo Saaya Hu Teri Saanso Se Jura,
Ek Pal Bhi Ise Khud Se Juda Na Paoge,
Mera Rab Gawah He Meri Mahobbat Ka,
Chahkar Bhi Tum Mujko Bhula Na Paoge.

st: ajane Kab Tak Ye Aankhein Uska Intejar
s:
ajane Kab Tak Ye Aankhein Uska Intejar
Karengi,
Uski Yaad Mai Kab Tak Khud Ko Bekarar
Karengi,
Usey To Ehsas Tak Nahi Is Mohabbat Ka Yaaro,
Kab Tak Ye Dhadkane Uska Aitbaar Karengi.

st: तुम आये तो लगा हर खुशी आ गई
s:
तुम आये तो लगा हर खुशी आ गई
यू लगा जैसे ज़िन्दगी आ गई
था जिस घड़ी का मुझे कब से इंतज़ार
अचानक वो मेरे करीब आ गई …

st: Tum kyu aise khoyi-khoyi si rehti ho ?
s:
Tum kyu aise khoyi-khoyi si rehti ho ?
Tum kyu aise ghum-shum si rehti ho ?
Konsa gum hai tumhe jo sabse chipati ho ?
Kisliye har baat par apna jee jalati ho ?
Kyu aaj tak tumne kisi ko apna banaya nahi ?
Kyu tumhe kisi ne hasna sikhaya nahi?

st: Chahat To Hum Bhi Rakte Hain,
s:
Chahat To Hum Bhi Rakte Hain,
Kisi Ke Dil Me Hum Bhi Dhadakte Hain,
Na Jane Woh Kab Milenge,
Jin Ke Liye Hum Roz Tadapte Hain.

st: 1 Pehchan Hazaro Rishte
s:
1 Pehchan Hazaro Rishte
Bana Deti Hai~!!
1 Muskan Hazaro Ghum
Bhula Deti Hai~!!
Zindagi Ke Safar Me Sambhal
Kar Chalna Mere Dosto,
1 Galatfahmi Hazaro Sapne
Jala Deti Hai...

st: Jis kadar zameen aasman ka milna mumkin nahi..
s:
Jis kadar zameen aasman ka milna mumkin nahi..
aisi hi kuch saza paa gayi hu tere pyaar mein..
to kar chalein missalein kayam dooriyon ki...
mai zindagi bhar pyaasi rahungi...
aur tum yuhin baraste rehna..

st: Jab Kisi Ko Chaho To Ye Ummid Mat Karo
s:
Jab Kisi Ko Chaho To Ye Ummid Mat Karo
.
Ki Wo Bhi Tumhe Hi Chahe...
.
KOSIS Karo
Tumhari Chahat AISI Ho
.
.
ki Use Tumhare SIWA KISI Or ki Chahat PASAND
Na Aaye...!!

st: Apni Yaadon Me Hum Tumhe
s:
Apni Yaadon Me Hum Tumhe 
Basana Chahte Hai

Apne Paas Tumhe Hum Bula
na Chahte Hai

Tumhe Yaad Karte Karte thak
gaye hai

Ab Hum Tumhey Yaad Aana 
Chahte Hai...

st: Kesay Kahon Main K Apna Bana Lo Mujhey,
s:
Kesay Kahon Main K Apna Bana Lo Mujhey,
Baahon Me Apni Tum Saama Lo Mujhey,

Bin Tumharey Ek Pal Bhi Ab Kat-ta Nahi Maera,
Bas Ab Tum Aa Ker Mujh Hi Se Chura Lo Mujhey,

...Zindagi To Wo Hai Sang Tumharey Jo Guzrey,
Duniya K Ghamon Se Ab To Chura lo Mujhey,

Maeri Sab Se Gehri Khuwahish Ho Jaye Puri,
Tum Agar Aaj Pass Apnay Bula Lo Mujhey,

Ye Kaesa Nasha Hai jo Behka Raha Hai Mujhey,
Agar Tumharay Hain Hum To Sambhalo Mujhey,

Najanay Phir kesay Guzrey Gi Apni Ye Zindagani,
Agar Apnay Dil Se Kabhi Tum Jo Nikalo Mujhey

st: Bura Na Man Agar Mai Tujhko Pyar Karti Hu,
s:
Bura Na Man Agar Mai Tujhko Pyar Karti Hu,
Gunah Kon Sa Aisa Mai Yar Karti Hu.. 

Meri Khataon Me Meri Samjh Ka Nahee Koi Dakhal,
Mai Jo Bhi Karti Hun Be Ikhtiyaar Karti Hu.. 

Tu Kitne Pyar Ke Qabil Ha Kya Khabar Mujhe,
Ke Mai To Jitna Bhi Mumkin Ho Bas Pyar Karti Hu.. 
Khuda Ki Duniya Se Itni Mohabbat Nahee Hai Shayad,
Khuda Ke Ek Bande Ko Jitna Mai Pyar Karti Hu.

st: Unke Bina Pal Bitana Muskil Hua...
s:
Unke Bina Pal Bitana Muskil Hua...
Chaha Bahut Par Unhe Btana Muskil
Hua
Ho Gaye Wo Is Kadar Apne
Ki Unki Galti Par Rooth Jana
Bhi Muskil Hua ..

st: Parwah kar uski jo teri parwah karey....
s:
Parwah kar uski jo teri parwah karey....
Zindagi mein jo kabhi na tanha karey…
Jaan “ban k utar ja uski “jaan” mein…
Jo”jaan” se bhi ziyada tujhse wafa karey

st: Chupke se "Chand ki Roshni" chhu jaye aapko,
s:
Chupke se "Chand ki Roshni" chhu jaye aapko,
Dheere se "Yeh hawa" kuch keh jaye aapko,

Dil se jo chahte ho maang lo khuda se 
Hum "Dua" karte hain mil jaye woh aapko

st: ना पीने का शौक था, ना पिलाने का शौक था,
s:
ना पीने का शौक था, ना पिलाने का शौक था,
हमे तो सिर्फ नझर मिलाने का शौक था,
पर क्या करे यारो, हम नझर ही उनसे मिला बैठे,
जिन्हे; सिर्फ; नझरो से पिलाने का शौक था !!

st: Kuch Lafz Bina Kahe Alfaaz Hote Hain,
s:
Kuch Lafz Bina Kahe Alfaaz Hote Hain,
Kuch Log is Kadar Khaas Hote Hain,
Door Ho Woh Chahe Nazron Se,
Lekin Fir Bhi Dil Ke Bahut Pas Hote Hain.

st: Aghosh Mein Lelo Mujhe Tanha Hoon Main
s:
Aghosh Mein Lelo Mujhe Tanha Hoon Main
Basa Lo Dil Ki Dhadkan Mein Tanha Hoon Main
Jo Tum Nahin Zindagi Mein Toh Kuchh Nahin
Samaa Jao Mujhi Mein Ke Tanha Hoon Main..

st: Mere Dil Me Tu Hi Tu Hai,
s:
Mere Dil Me Tu Hi Tu Hai,
Dil Ki Dawa Kya Karu..,.

Dil Bhi Tu Hai,
Jaan Bhi Tu Hai,
Tujh Pe Fidaa Kya Karu..

st: Aaj Tumhari Baanh'on Me Rehnay Ko
s:
Aaj Tumhari Baanh'on Me Rehnay Ko
Humara Dil Kar Raha Hai,

Aaj Apne Mann Ki har baat batane
Ko Humara Dil Kar Raha Hai,

Kaesy Yaqeen Di'lain Tumhain Aaj
Hum Apne Bhar-Pur Pyaar Ka,

Aaj Jee Jaan Se Tum Pe Mit Janay
Ko Humara Dil Kar Raha Hai,

st: Aghosh Mein Lelo Mujhe Tanha Hoon Main
s:
Aghosh Mein Lelo Mujhe Tanha Hoon Main
Basa Lo Dil Ki Dhadkan Mein Tanha Hoon Main
Jo Tum Nahin Zindagi Mein Toh Kuchh Nahin
Samaa Jao Mujhi Mein Ke Tanha Hoon Main.

st: Ek Sapne Ki Tarah Tujhe Saja Ke Rakhun,
s:
Ek Sapne Ki Tarah Tujhe Saja Ke Rakhun,
Chandni Raat Ki Nazron Se Chhupa Ke Rakhun..

Meri Taqdeer Mein Tumhara Saath Nahi,
Warna Saari Umar Tujhe Apna Bana Ke Rakhun .....!!

st: Tera Saath hai Toh mujhe kya kami hai..
s:
Tera Saath hai Toh mujhe kya kami hai..
Teri har muskan se mili mujhe kushi hai...

Muskuraate Rehna isi Tarah humesha ..!
Kyonki teri is muskan mein meri jaan basi hai ...!!

st: Tu lafzon ki tarha mujh se kitabon mein mila kar,
s:
Tu lafzon ki tarha mujh se kitabon mein mila kar,
Logon ka tujhe dar hai tu khawabon mein mila kar
Phool ka khushboo se taluk hain zaruri,
Tu mehak ban kar mujh se gulabon mein mila kar
Jise chhu kar main mehsoos kar saku,
Tu masti ki tarha mujh se sharabon mein mila kar
Main bhi insan hu, hai dar mujhko bhi behakne ka
Is waaste tu mujh se hijabon mein mila kar….!!!

st: Kyon daren ki zindagi mein kya hoga..
s:
Kyon daren ki zindagi mein kya hoga..
har waqt kyon sochen ki bura hoga..
Badhte rahen manzilon ki aor hum..
Kuchh na bhi mila toh kya tazurba toh naya hoga ...!

st: जो कभी फैसला वो
s:
जो कभी फैसला वो
साथ चलने का करे..

दुआ है खुदा से
मुझे मंज़िल ही ना मिले.!!

st: Khubsurat Sa Koi Pal Ek Kissa Banjata Hai,
s:
Khubsurat Sa Koi Pal Ek Kissa Banjata Hai,
Na Jaane Kab Koi Zindagi Ka Hissa Ban Jata Hai,
Zindagi Main Kuch Log Aise Bhi Milte Hai,
Jinse Kabhi Na Tutne Wala Rista Banjata Hai...

st: Hathon ki lakiron main kismat hoti hai,
s:
Hathon ki lakiron main kismat hoti hai,
Milna aur bhul jana logo ki fitrat hoti hai,
Bikharta to har koi hai dard me,
Magar gum bhulana insaan ki jarurat hoti hai.

st: Meri Aankhon ke Samandar mein Jalan kaisi hai
s:
Meri Aankhon ke Samandar mein Jalan kaisi hai
Aaj phir dil ko Tarapne ki Lagan kaisi hai
Ab Is raah pe Chiraghon ki Qatarein bhi nahi
Ab tere Shehar ki Galiyon mein Ghutan kaisi hai…

st: Tere pyaar ka sila har haal mein denge,
s:
Tere pyaar ka sila har haal mein denge,
Khuda bhi maange ye dil toh taal denge...
Agar dil ne keha tum bewafa ho,
Toh is dil ko bhi seene se nikaal denge ...!

st: Dil ko mere ghayal kar gaye khanjar hain
s:
Dil ko mere ghayal kar gaye khanjar hain
tumhari aankhein ,,

Zindagi meri mehkane lagi hai khushbu jaisi hain
tumhari saansein ,,

Lagta hai chahat mein lipat gaya hun aisi hain
tumhari baahein ,, 

Shayari ke jaise likhta rehta hun aisi hain tumhari
baatein..!!

st: छू ले आसमान ज़मीन की तलाश ना कर,
s:
छू ले आसमान ज़मीन की तलाश ना कर,
जी ले ज़िंदगी खुशी की तलाश ना कर,
तकदीर बदल जाएगी खुद ही मेरे दोस्त,
मुस्कुराना सीख ले वजह की तलाश ना कर.

st: तुम आये तो लगा हर खुशी आ गई
s:
तुम आये तो लगा हर खुशी आ गई
यू लगा जैसे ज़िन्दगी आ गई
था जिस घड़ी का मुझे कब से इंतज़ार
अचानक वो मेरे करीब आ गई …

st: चाहत की कोई हद नहीँ होती..
s:
चाहत की कोई हद नहीँ होती..
सारी उम्र भी बीत जाए..
मोहब्बत कभी कम नहीँ होती.!!

st: Pyar ek haseen lamha hai usko jeene wala chahiye
s:
Pyar ek haseen lamha hai usko jeene wala chahiye
Pyar ek sapno ki duniya hai usme rehne wala chahiye
Pyar ek vishvas hai uss per sath chalne wala chahiye
Pyar ek khushi hai jisko baatne wala chahiye
Pyar ek bejuba shabd jisko bolne wala chahiye
Pyar ek aashiqui hai jiska sath nibhane wala chahiye
Pyar ek gam bhi hai jisme aansoo pochne wala chahiye
Pyar ek sath suro ka sangam hai jisme taal milane wala chahiye
Pyar ek diwangi hai jisme kho jane wala chahiye
Pyar ek raaz hai jisko samajhne wala chahiye
Pyar ek nadani hai ussa bacchane wala chahiye
Pyar ek khamoshi hai jisse padhne wala chahiye
Pyar ek heera hai jisko khojne wala chahiye
Pyar ek ehsas hai jisko mehsus karne wala chahiye
Pyar ek aadhura shabd hai usko pura karne wala chahiye
Pyar ek rishta hai jisko apnane wala chahiye
Pyar ek jivan hai jiske sath jingadi bitane wala chahiye..

st: Wo Ek Pal Hi Kaafi Hai
s:
Wo Ek Pal Hi Kaafi Hai
" Jisme Tum Shamil Ho "
.
Uss Pal Se Jyada Toh
Zindagi Ki Khwaish Hi Nahi Mujhe .

st: Izhaar 'e' yaad karu....
s:
Izhaar 'e' yaad karu....
Ya puchun haal 'e' dil unkaa.....

Ayee dil kuch to bahana bata....
unse guftgu karne kaa..

st: वो मायूसी के लम्होँ मेँ
s:
वो मायूसी के लम्होँ मेँ
ज़रा भी हौँसला देते तो..

हम काग़ज़ की कश्ती पे
समंदर मेँ उतर जाते.!!

st: Teri Dharkan Hi Zindagi
s:
Teri Dharkan Hi Zindagi
Ka Kissa Hai Mera...
Tu Zindagi Ka Ek Eham
Hissa Hai Mera...
.
.
Meri Mohabbat Tujhse,
Sirf Lafzo Ki Nahin Hai...
Teri Rooh Se Rooh Tak Ka
Rishta Hai Mera...!!

st: Aaj bhi ek sawal hai is dil me.,
s:
Aaj bhi ek sawal hai is dil me.,
Pyar ka gam beshumar hai is dil me..

Kuch keh nahi pata ye kambakht dil..,

Magar tumhare liye Aaj bhi
bahut pyar hai is dil mein..!!

st: नक़ाब उठा कर जब भी वो
s:
नक़ाब उठा कर जब भी वो
चमन से गुज़रती है...

समझ कर फूल उसके लबोँ
पर तितली बैठ जाती है.!!

st: ISHTA unse banao jo nibhaana jaantein ho,
s:
ISHTA unse banao jo nibhaana jaantein ho,
NAFRAT unse karo jo bhulaana jaantein ho.
GUSSA unse karo jo manaana jaantein ho,
aur PYAR unse karo jo DIL-O-JAAN lutaana jaantein ho....!!

st: ishq kaise hota hai..ishq kisko kahete hai mohsin
s:
ishq kaise hota hai..ishq kisko kahete hai mohsin
tera majboor kar dena mera majboor ho jaana

st: kar meri mohabbat ka aitbaar samandar
s:
kar meri mohabbat ka aitbaar samandar 
mai bo kasti hu jise koi duba nhi sakta .

st: उसका वादा भी अजीब था.. कि जिन्दगी भर साथ निभायेंगे, मैंने भी ये नहीं पुछा की मोहब्बत के साथ या यादों के साथ..!!
s: उसका वादा भी अजीब था.. कि जिन्दगी भर साथ निभायेंगे, मैंने भी ये नहीं पुछा की मोहब्बत के साथ या यादों के साथ..!!

st: zindagi mein manzileen to mil hi jaati hai mohsin
s:
zindagi mein manzileen to mil hi jaati hai mohsin
bus woh log nahi milte jinhe is dil ne chaha ho

st: kash ye dunia haseen hoti
s:
kash ye dunia haseen hoti
khud k chahne sy her dua kabool hoti
khny k liye tu sbi apny hn
pr kash koi aisa hota
jisay mere dard sy b takleef hoti.

st: Suno...
s:
Suno...

Maine Tumse Mohabbat Ki Hai,
Ab Ye "Gunaah" Hai Toh Hai..

Tujh Bin Jeene Ki Aadat Nahi Mujhe,
Ab Ye "Khata" Hai Toh Hai..

Tum Na Mile Toh Shayad Main Jee Na Sakun,
Ab Ye "Bewqoofi" Hai Toh Hai..

Main Janta Hun Ki Tumhe Nafart Hai Mujh se,
Par Mujhe Tujh se "Mohabbat" Hai Toh Hai ...!!

st: Aisa Nahi Ke Ham Ko Mohabbat Nahi Mili
s:
Aisa Nahi Ke Ham Ko Mohabbat Nahi Mili
Tumhain Chahtay Thay, Per Teri Ulfat Nahi Mili

Milnay Ko Zindagi Mein Tou Kayi Hamsafar Milay
Per Un Ki Tabiyat Se Tabiyat Nahi Mili

Chehron Mein Dosron Ke Tujhe Dhoondtay Rahay
Soorat Nahi Mili Kaheen Seerat Nahi Mili

Bohat Dair Se Aaya TU Mere Paas
Alfaaz Dhoondnay Ki Bhi Mohlat Nahi Mili

Tujh Ko Gila Hai Ke Tawajja Na Di Tujhe
Laikin Ham Ko Tou Khud Apni Mohabbat Nahi Mili

Ham Ko Tou Teri Har Aadat Achi Lagi “
Afsos Ke Tujh Se Meri Aadat Nahi Mili

st: Meri Khamoshi Meri
s:
Meri Khamoshi Meri
Aadat Hai,

In Dooriyon Mein Bhi Meri
Chahat Hai,

Meri Zindagi Agar
Khubsurat Hai,

Toh Uski Wajah Aapki Muskurahat Hai ...!

st: Mera har pal aaj khoobsurat hain,
s:
Mera har pal aaj khoobsurat hain,
Dil mein jo sirf teri hi soorat hain,
Kuch bhi kahe ye duniya gum nahi
Duniya se jyada hume teri jarurat h

st: Meri saanson me bikhar jao toh achhaa hai
s:
Meri saanson me bikhar jao toh achhaa hai
Ban k rooh mere jism me utar jao to acha hai
Kisi raat teri godh mein sir rakh kr so jaon
Us raat ki kabhi subah na ho toh achha hai..!!

st: Jee chahta hain tum se pyari si baat ho,
s:
Jee chahta hain tum se pyari si baat ho,
Haseen chand tare ho, lambi si raat ho,
Fir raat bhar yhi guftagu rakhe hum dono
Tum meri zindagi ho, tum meri kayinat ho.

st: Agar main hd se guzar jau toh muje maaf karna,
s:
Agar main hd se guzar jau toh muje maaf karna,
Tere dil me utar jau toh mujhe maaf karna,
Raat me tujhe dekh ke tere deedar ki khatir,
Pal bhar jo theher jaun toh mujhe maaf karna…!!

st: Na hum rhe dil lagane kabil,
s:
Na hum rhe dil lagane kabil,
Na dil rha gam uthane kabil,
Lage uski yaado ke jo zakham dil par,
Na chhoda usne muskurane ke kabil..!

st: Kabhi hum pe wo jan diya karte the,
s:
Kabhi hum pe wo jan diya karte the,
Jo hum kehte the wo maan liya karte the,
Aaj pas se anjaan banke guzar gaye,
Jo dur se hume pehchan liya kerte the..!!

st: Kitaabo me kehte hai phool todna mana hai
s:
Kitaabo me kehte hai phool todna mana hai
Baagon me kehte hai phool todna mana hai
Phoolon se keemti cheez hain dil
Koyi nahi kehta ki dil todna mana hain…..!!

st: Mohabbat ki daastan sunane aaye hain,
s:
Mohabbat ki daastan sunane aaye hain,
Tabaah krne k bad wo pyar jatane aye hai
Aansu pochh liye the hamnein kab ke
Magar wo fir se aaj hume rulane aaye hai.

st: Kash woh samjhte is dil ki tadap ko
s:
Kash woh samjhte is dil ki tadap ko
To yun humein ruswa na kiya hota
Unki ye berukhi bhi manzoor thi hme
Bas ek baar humein samjh liya hota..!

st: Meri zindagi mujhe yeh bata,
s:
Meri zindagi mujhe yeh bata,
Mujhe bhul kr tujhe kya mila.?
Meri hasrato ka hisaab de,
Dil tor kar tujhe kya mila….?
Tere chaar din ke pyaar se,
Mujhe umar bhar ka gum mila
Main toot kar bikhar gaya,
Mujhe tor kr tujhe kya mila..??

st: Paas aa zara dil ki baat btaun tujhko,
s:
Paas aa zara dil ki baat btaun tujhko,
Kese dharkta ha dil awaz sunau tujhko,
Aakar tu dekh le dil pe likha h nam tera
Agr kahe to dil cheer ke dikhaun tujko.
Jitna jalaya hai tune pyar me mujhko,
Dil to krta hai mein b jalaun tujhko
Ajnabi hota toh aisa kar bhi lete,
Mgr tum to apne ho kese sataun tujhko.

st: Anjaan ek saathi ka iss dil ko intejar hai,
s:
Anjaan ek saathi ka iss dil ko intejar hai,
Pyasa hain ye aankhen aur dil bekarar hai,
Unke saath mil jaye to har raah aasan ho jayegi,
Shayad issi anokhey ehsaas ka naam Pyaar hai.

st: Meri chahat ko apni mohabbat bana ke dekh,
s:
Meri chahat ko apni mohabbat bana ke dekh,
Meri hasee ko apne honto pe muskura k dekh
Mere aansoo ko apni aankho se gira ke dekh,
Meri tadap ko apne dil se mehsus kar ke dekh,
Ye mohabbat ek haseen tohfaa hain aye-jaan,
Kabi mohabbat ko mohabbat ki tarah b nibha k dekh

st: Koi kahe isse Jjadu ki jhappi,
s:
Koi kahe isse Jjadu ki jhappi,
Koi kahe isse pyaar..
Mauka hai khoobsurat,
Aa gale lag ja mere yaar..

st: Apni bahon mein mujhe bikhar jane do.
s:
Apni bahon mein mujhe bikhar jane do.
Saanso se apni mujhe mehak jane do.
Dil bechain hai kabse iss pyar ke liye.
Aaj to sine mein apne mujhe uter jane do

st: Ye wada hain humara,
s:
Ye wada hain humara,
Na chhodenge kabhi saath tumhara.
Jo gaye tum hume bhool kar,
Le aayenge pakad kar haath tumhara.

st: Wada karte hain dosti nibhayenge
s:
Wada karte hain dosti nibhayenge
Koshish yahi rahegi tujhe na satyaenge
Zarurat pade toh dil se pukarana
Mar bhi rahe honge to mohlat lekar aayenge!!

st: Kaun Hai Woh Jo Dil Mein Samaye Huye Hain,
s:
Kaun Hai Woh Jo Dil Mein Samaye Huye Hain,
Uske Liye Hum Har Khusi Bhulaye Huye Hain,
Najar Nahi Aata Par Tadap Mahsoos Hoti Hai,
Andekhe Yaar Ke Liye Sapne Sajaye Huye Hain…

st: Laakh Pardon Par Tumhein Duniya Ne Chhupa Rakha Hai,
s:
Laakh Pardon Par Tumhein Duniya Ne Chhupa Rakha Hai,
Chand Pardon Mein Tumne Khud Ko Chhipa Rakha Hai,
Eh Chhupane Waale Yeh Bhi Chhupa Kar Rakhna,
Humne Tumhein Apne Dil Mein Chhupa Ke Rakha Hai…

st: Jabse Mulakat Huyi Hai Unse Meri,
s:
Jabse Mulakat Huyi Hai Unse Meri,
Tabse Mere Dil Ko Karaar Aaya,

Kabhi Zulph Lahraai Kabhi Nakhara Kiya,
Unki In Adaaon Par Bahut Pyar Aaya…

st: Laakh Bandisen Laga Le Duniya Hum Par,
s:
Laakh Bandisen Laga Le Duniya Hum Par,
Magar Dil Par Kaabu Nahi Kar Payenge,

Woh Lamha Aakhiri Hoga Zeevan Ka Hamara,
Jis Din Hum Yaar Tujhe Bhul Jayenge…

st: Dil Par Na Mere Yun Waar Kijiye,
s:
Dil Par Na Mere Yun Waar Kijiye,
Chodo Yeh Nafrat Thoda Pyar Kijiye,

Tadapte Hain Jis Kadar Tere Pyar Mein Hum,
Kabhi Khud Ko Bhi Us Kadar Bekraar Kijiye….

st: Chaahat Ke Yeh Kaise Afsane Huye,
s:
Chaahat Ke Yeh Kaise Afsane Huye,
Khud Nazron Mein Apni Begane Huye,

Kisi Bhi Riste Ka Khayal Nahi Mujhe,
Ishq Mein Tere Is Kadar Diwaane Huye….

st: Mana Ki Tumhein Mujhse Jyada Gham Hoga,
s:
Mana Ki Tumhein Mujhse Jyada Gham Hoga,
Magar Rone Se Yeh Gham Kabhi Na Kam Hoga,

Jeet Hi Lenge Dil Ki Nakam Baaziyan Hum,
Agar Mohabbat Mein Hamari Dam Hoga….

st: Khata Pahli Samajh Kar Maaf Kar Dena,
s:
Khata Pahli Samajh Kar Maaf Kar Dena,
Raah E Wafa Mein Ho Jaaye Jo Gunaah Hamse,

Mohabbat Ki Hadein Paar Kar Chuke Hain Sanam,
Phir Kaise Hain Dilbar Yeh Parde Hum Se….

st: Is Se Pahle Ki Saare Khwab Toot Jaayein ,
s:
Is Se Pahle Ki Saare Khwab Toot Jaayein ,
Aur Yeh Zindagi Hum Se Rooth Jaaye,

Ek Doosre Ke Pyar Mein Kho Jaayein Iss Kadar ,
Ke Hum Saare Ghamon Ko Bhool Jayein…

st: Kya Hasino Se Dil Lagate Ho,
s:
Kya Hasino Se Dil Lagate Ho,
Kabhi Zindagi Ka Maza Bhi Uthaiye

Pyar Milna, Nahi Milna, Kismat Ke Haath Hai,
Kisi Ko Itni Jaldi Na Khuda Banaiye…..

st: Dil Se Tera Pyar Hoga Kam Nahi,
s:
Dil Se Tera Pyar Hoga Kam Nahi,
Tum Bewafa Huve Toh Kya, Aur Ek Gham Sahi,

Aapka Faisla Aapke Karm Karenge,
Sab Kuchh Milega Tumhe Magar Honge Hum Nahi….

st: Zindgi Mujhe Jeene Ke Liye Dua Chahiye,
s:
Zindgi Mujhe Jeene Ke Liye Dua Chahiye,
Us Par Kismat Ki Bhi Wafa Chahiye,

Khuda Ke Raham Se Sab Kuchh Hai Mere Paas,
Bas Pyar Karne Ke Liye Mahbooba Chahiye….

st: Pal Bhar Ke Liye Agar Woh Hamein Apna Bana Le,
s:
Pal Bhar Ke Liye Agar Woh Hamein Apna Bana Le,
Aapne Zeevan Ka Agar Woh Sapna Bana Le,

Phir Bhale Hi Woh Mera Dil Tod De,
Bus Is Raat Ke Liye Woh Mujhe Sajna Bana Le…

st: Is Se Pahle Ki Saare Khwab Toot Jaayein ,
s:
Is Se Pahle Ki Saare Khwab Toot Jaayein ,
Aur Yeh Zindagi Hum Se Rooth Jaaye,

Ek Doosre Ke Pyar Mein Kho Jaayein Iss Kadar ,
Ke Hum Saare Ghamon Ko Bhool Jaayein…

st: Meri Mahbooba Hum Tumko Salaam Karte Hain,
s:
Meri Mahbooba Hum Tumko Salaam Karte Hain,
Fir Bhi Aap Hamein Yun Badnaam Karte Hain,
Pyar Jatakar Dil Tod Dena Pyar Mein,
Janvaron Se Ghatiya Kaam Yeh Insaan Karte Hain….

st: Dost Bankar Is Kadar Dushmani Ki Hai,
s:
Dost Bankar Is Kadar Dushmani Ki Hai,
Jaise Naajuk Aaine Se Dillagi Ki Hai,

Jo Ik Najar Dekhne Se Hi Bikhar Gaya,
Yun Rokar, Basar Humne Zindagi Ki Hai….

st: Nasha Tha Unke Pyar Ka,
s:
Nasha Tha Unke Pyar Ka,
Jis Mein Hum Kho Gaye,
Unhe Bhi Nahi Pata Chala,
Ki Kab Hum Unke Ho Gaye…

st: Yaadon Ke Bhanwar Mein Ek Pal Humara Ho,
s:
Yaadon Ke Bhanwar Mein Ek Pal Humara Ho,
Khilte Chaman Mein Ek Gul Humara Ho,
Aur Jab Yaad Kare Aap Apno Ko To Uss,
Yaad Mein Ek Naam Hamara Ho…

st: Jaan Hai Mujhko Zindagi Se Pyari,
s:
Jaan Hai Mujhko Zindagi Se Pyari,
Jaan Ke Liye Kar Doon Kurban Yaari,
Jaan Ke Liye Todd Doon Dosti Tumhaari,
Ab Tumse Kya Chhupana,
Tum Hi To Ho Jaan Hamaari…

st: Dil Ki Aawaz Ko Izhaar Kehte Hai,
s:
Dil Ki Aawaz Ko Izhaar Kehte Hai,
Jhuki Nigah Ko Iqrar Kehte Hai,
Sirf Paane Ka Naam Ishq Nahi,
Kuch Khone Ko Bhi Pyar Kehte Hai…

st: Humne Chaand Se Pooha,
s:
Humne Chaand Se Pooha,
Teri Chaandni Ka Raaz Kya Hai,
Chaand Ne Aapki Taraf Ishara,
Kar Ke Kaha Inhi Say Pucho Jisay,
Dekh Kar Main Chamakta Hoon…

st: Tum Tab Tak Pyar Se Pyar Mat Karo Ki,
s:
Tum Tab Tak Pyar Se Pyar Mat Karo Ki,
Pyar Tum Se Pyar Na Kare,
Pyar Ko Itna Pyar Karo Ki,
Pyar Kisi Aur Se Pyar Na Kare…

st: Tamanna Karte Ho Jin Khushion Ki,
s:
Tamanna Karte Ho Jin Khushion Ki,
Woh Khushiaan Aapke Kadmon Mein Ho,

Bhagwan Aapko Woh Haqeeqat Mein De,
Joo Socha Aapne Sapnon Mein Ho…

st: Kaun Kehta Hai Ishq Me Bas Ikraar Hota Hai
s:
Kaun Kehta Hai Ishq Me Bas Ikraar Hota Hai
Kaun Kehta Hai Ishq Me Bas Inkaar Hota Hai,
Tanhai Ko Tum Bebasi Ka Naam Na Do,
Kyunki Ishq Ka Doosra Naam Hi Intezaar Hota Hai…

st: Dono Aankhon Mein Ashq Diya Karte Hai,
s:
Dono Aankhon Mein Ashq Diya Karte Hai,
Hum Aapni Neende Tere Naam Kiya Karte Hai,
Jab Bhi Palak Jhapke Tumhari Samajh Lena,
Hum Tumhe Yaad Kiya Karte Hai…

st: Mohabbat Ki Shama Jalake To Dekho,
s:
Mohabbat Ki Shama Jalake To Dekho,
Zara Dil Ki Duniya Saza Kar To Dekho,
Tumhe Ho Na Jaye Mohabbat To Kehna,
Zara Humse Nazrein Milake To Dekho…

st: Humne Dekhi Hai In Aankhon Ki Mehakti Khusbu,
s:
Humne Dekhi Hai In Aankhon Ki Mehakti Khusbu,
Haath Se Chhu Ke Ise Ishq Ka Ilzaam Na Do,
Ek Ehsaas Hai Ise Rooh Se Mahsoos Karo,
Pyar Ko Pyar Hi Rehne Do Ise Koi Dusra Naam Na Do…

st: Dekh Meri Aankho Mein Khawab Kiske Hai,
s:
Dekh Meri Aankho Mein Khawab Kiske Hai,
Dill Me Mere Sulagte Toofan Kis Ke Hai,

Nahi Guzra Koi Aaj Tak Is Raaste Se Ho Kar,
Phir Ye Kadmo Ke Nishaan Kiske Hai…

st: Mann Mein Sabka Armaan Nahi Hota,
s:
Mann Mein Sabka Armaan Nahi Hota,
Har Koi Dill Ka Mehamaan Nahi Hota,
Par Ek Baar Dill Me Sama Jaye Use ,
Bhulana Aasaan Nahi Hota…

st: Jab Ho Aapka Pyara Sa Saath,
s:
Jab Ho Aapka Pyara Sa Saath,
Aur Ho Haathon Mein Haath,
Tanhai Ho….Rangeen Ho Sama Jahan Koi Aur Nahi,
Sirf Aap Aur Hum Ho Wahan,
Tab Hogi Barsaat Pyar Ki,
Mere Aur Sirf Mere Pyar Ki…

st: Humne Dekhi Hai In Aankhon Ki Mehakti Khusbu,
s:
Humne Dekhi Hai In Aankhon Ki Mehakti Khusbu,
Haath Se Chhu Ke Ise Ishq Ka Ilzaam Na Do,

Ek Ehsaas Hai Ise Rooh Se Mehsoos Karo,
Pyar Ko Pyar Hi Rahne Do Ise Koi Dusra Naam Na Do…

st: Dill Ki Kitaab Kaa Panna Churaa Le Gyaa Koi,
s:
Dill Ki Kitaab Kaa Panna Churaa Le Gyaa Koi,
Neend Aankhon Se Udaa Ley Gyaa Koi,
Peene Ki Aadat Nahi Thee,
Humein Zaam Nigahoon Se Pilaa Gaya Koi…

st: Kosis Bahut Ki Dil Ko Samjhne Ki,
s:
Kosis Bahut Ki Dil Ko Samjhne Ki,
Aankho Ko Kasam Di So Jane Ki,
Bahut Samjhaya Phir Bhi Aankhe Nahi Soi,
Soi Tab Jab Maine Baat Ki Aapke Khawabo Me Aane Ki…

st: Aanko Ki Saja Tab Tak Hai,
s:
Aanko Ki Saja Tab Tak Hai,
Jab Tak Didar Na Ho,
 Dil Ki Saja Tab Tak Hai,
Jab Tak Pyar Na Ho,

Ye Jindgi Bhi Ek Saza Hai,
Jab Tak Aap Jaisa Yar Na Ho…

st: Kaash Aisa Ho Ki Tumko Tumse Chura Loon
s:
Kaash Aisa Ho Ki Tumko Tumse Chura Loon
Waqt Ko Rok Kar Waqt Se Ek Din Chura Loon
Tum Paas Ho To Is Raat Se Ek Raat Chura Loon
Tum Saath Ho To Is Jahan Se Ye Jahan Chura Loon…

st: Lab Khamosh Ho Jate Hain
s:
Lab Khamosh Ho Jate Hain
Jab Tum Samne Aate Ho
Dil Dhadkta Hain Jab Nigahe Milate Ho
Saans Rukti Hain Jab Tum Muskarate Ho
Dil Kamjor Hain Mera
Itna Kyo Darate Ho…

st: Savan Ki Barsat Ka Kya Kru
s:
Savan Ki Barsat Ka Kya Kru
Dil Ki Tapis Ko Kya Kru
Lejaye Kahan Waqt Ka Dariya Kya Janu
Dil Pe Huwa Kisi Ka Asar
Bolo Aab Us Asar Ka Kya Karun…

st: Dil Ka Rishta Hai Hamara
s:
Dil Ka Rishta Hai Hamara
Dil Ke Kone Mein Naam Hai Tumhara
Har Yaad Mein Hai Chehra Tumhara
Hum Sath Nhi To Kya Hua
Zindagi Bhar Pyar Nibhane Ka Wada Hai Hamara…

st: Unse Door Bhala Hum Kaise Reh Pate
s:
Unse Door Bhala Hum Kaise Reh Pate
Dil Se Unhe Kaise Bhula Pate
Kaash Ki Woh Sanso Ke Illava Aayine Mein Bhi Hote
Khud Ko Bhi Dekhte To Woh Nazar Aate…

st: Tere Chehre Ki Chamak Sada Bani Rahe
s:
Tere Chehre Ki Chamak Sada Bani Rahe
Hansi In Labo Pe Hmesa Sji Rahe
Dur Rakhe Khuda Sare Gamo Se Tujhe
Khusi Tere Daman Me Sada Bani Rahe…

st: Meri Har Khta Pe Naraj Na Hona
s:
Meri Har Khta Pe Naraj Na Hona
Apni Pyari Si Muskan Kabhi Na Khona
Sukoon Milta Hai Dekh Kar Aapki Hansi Ko
Mujhe Maut Bhi Aa Jaye To Bhi Na Rona…

st: Pyar Ka Matlab Wo Jane Jo Dil Ka Sauda Karte Hai
s:
Pyar Ka Matlab Wo Jane Jo Dil Ka Sauda Karte Hai
Preet Ke Liye Pritam Har Diwar Ko Raunda Karte Hai
Pyar Ek Se Hota Hai Ye Hota Nahi Aneko Se
Wada Hota Jhutha Na Or Ek Duje Pe Marte Hai…

st: Ae Khuda Salaamat Rakhna Unko,
s:
Ae Khuda Salaamat Rakhna Unko,
Jo Humse Nafrat Karte Hain,
Pyar Na Sahi Nafrat Hi Sahi,
Kuchh To Hai Jo Wo Sirf Humse Karte Hain…

st: Chand Ki Tarah Chamkate Husn Humne Dekhe Hain,
s:
Chand Ki Tarah Chamkate Husn Humne Dekhe Hain,
Ishq Mein Kayi Dil Tadpate Dekhe Hain,

Jo Noor Apni Aankhon Ka,Mahboob Ko Bata Dete Hain,
Woh Aasiq Humne Benoor Tadpate Dekhe Hain….

st: Yeh Mana Humne Ki,
s:
Yeh Mana Humne Ki,
Khuda Ne Tumhein Soorat Di Hai,

Fir Bhi Magroor Na Kar,
Ki Teri Surat Se Khuda Nahi Hai….

st: Pesh Karte Hain Yeh Chhota Sa Tohfa,
s:
Pesh Karte Hain Yeh Chhota Sa Tohfa,
Aitraaj Na Ho Toh Kabool Farmana,

Yeh Thoda Sa Dhaar Hai Mere Dil Ka,
Har Saal Ki Tarah Ise Dil Mein Basana…

st: Afsos Hai Hamein Us Ghadi Ka,
s:
Afsos Hai Hamein Us Ghadi Ka,
Jab Tumse Dil Laga Baithe,

Tere Pyar Ki Khatir Eh Sandil,
Hum Apni Har Khusi Ganva Baithe….

st: Agar Tujhe Bhulana Aasan Hota,
s:
Agar Tujhe Bhulana Aasan Hota,
Toh Kab Ke Bhula Dete,

Agar Mere Dil Mein Tera Naam Na Hota,
Toh Kab Ka Is Dil Ko Jala Dete….

st: Tumhein Khusi Dene Ki Khatir,
s:
Tumhein Khusi Dene Ki Khatir,
Tujh Se Dil Laga Baithe,

Armaa Na Tha Mohabbat Ka,
Tujh Se Mohabbat Kar Baithe….

st: Abke Baras Woh Nahi Aaye Bahar Mein,
s:
Abke Baras Woh Nahi Aaye Bahar Mein,
Gujrega Ab Ek Baras Intezar Mein,

Tute Dil Mein Teri Mohabbat Tera Khyal,
Khush Rang Ho Bahar Ke Gujri Bahar Mein….

st: Chand Lamhe Hamein Pyar Ke Udhar De De,
s:
Chand Lamhe Hamein Pyar Ke Udhar De De,
Ki Marne Se Pahle Hamein Jhuta Karar De De,

Kuchh Der Hi Teri Yaad Mere Dil Se Mit Jaaye,
Yahi Soch Kar Tu Thoda Sa Sharab De De….

st: Hoton Par Naam Hai Tera,
s:
Hoton Par Naam Hai Tera,
Dil Mein Yaad Hai Teri,
Zamane Se Hamein Kya Lena,
Jab Tujhmein Basi Hai Jaan Meri….

st: Chahte Hain Aapko Kitna,
s:
Chahte Hain Aapko Kitna,
Yeh Koi Nahi Jaanta,

Aap Ke Bina Hum Jiye,
Yeh Dil Hi Nahi Manta….

st: Bewafa Jahan Ki Bewafayi Raat Aayi,
s:
Bewafa Jahan Ki Bewafayi Raat Aayi,
Mere Pyar Ki Wafayi Na Raas Aayi,
Eh Sanam Kyamat Tak Hamein Yaad Rakhoge,
Ke Tum Bhi Kabhi Pyar Ko Tadpoge….

st: Eh Zindagi Jaate Jaate Meri Duaen Leto Ja,
s:
Eh Zindagi Jaate Jaate Meri Duaen Leto Ja,
Dil Se Bhula Dena Har Ek Khata,

Saja Jo Bhi Deni Ho Mujhe Woh Bhi Deti Ja,
Ki Ab Toh Teri Yaad Ke Siwa Nahi Kuchh Bacha…

st: In Pyari Nigahon Ko Na Jhukao.
s:
In Pyari Nigahon Ko Na Jhukao.
Ki Humse Yeh Saha Na Jaayega,

Hamein Yun Akela Chhod Ke Na Jaao,
Ki Tere Bina Humse Raha Na Jayega….

st: Teri Ek Tavassum Se Sanam,
s:
Teri Ek Tavassum Se Sanam,
Murjhaye Phool Bhi Khil Jaaye,

Teri Hansi Rukhsaar Dekh Kar,
Mahtaab Bhi Sarma Jaaye….

st: Itna Pyaar Na Kar, Ke, Ishq Bhi,
s:
Itna Pyaar Na Kar, Ke, Ishq Bhi,
Ro Padega Teri Wafa Dekh Kar,

Tum Milo Na Milo Par,
Rab Zaroor Jal Uthega, Tumhara Junoon Dekh Kar….

st: Kasam Li Thi Tere Dar Aane Ki,
s:
Kasam Li Thi Tere Dar Aane Ki,
Hashar Yeh Hua Dar Apna Hi Chhod Baithe,

Mere Saaye Se Dara Karte The Jo,
Hashar Hua Yeh Dil Mujhi Se Jod Baithe,

Lat Thi Peene Ki Mujhe Aankho Se Kya Pilayi,
Chod Maykada Paimana Tod Baithe….

st: Pyar Mein Tere Hum Is Kadar Kho Gaye Hain,
s:
Pyar Mein Tere Hum Is Kadar Kho Gaye Hain,
Zamane Se Bekhabar Hum Tere Dil Mein So Gaye Hain,
Mat Uthana Ab Hamein Apne Dil Ki God Se,
Hum Sada Ke Liye Ab Tumhaare Ho Gaye Hain…

st: Tu Jo Hai Saath, Toh Hai Har Khusi,
s:
Tu Jo Hai Saath, Toh Hai Har Khusi,
Tere Saath Hi Hai Meri Yeh Zindagi,

Tera Saath Hai Toh Hai Sab Kuchh Mera,
Tere Bin Toh Yara Main Kuchh Bhi Nahi…

st: Mujhe Bhool Jana Koi Gham Na Karna,
s:
Mujhe Bhool Jana Koi Gham Na Karna,
Mere Baad Aankhon Ko Tum Nam Na Karna,
Kisi Aur Ka Thaam Lena Tu Daman,
Mere Baad Jholi Ko Phoolon Se Bharna….

st: Kisi Aur Ko Dosh Kyu Dete Ho,
s:
Kisi Aur Ko Dosh Kyu Dete Ho,
Apni Mohabbat Mein Dam Hona Chahiye,

Bhale Kaisa Bhi Aaye Vakt Jeevan Mein,
Yaar Par Bharosa Na Kam Hona Chahiye….

st: Yun Kahne Ko Sab Hai Duniya Mein,
s:
Yun Kahne Ko Sab Hai Duniya Mein,
Par Yeh Tanhai Kyu Saath Rahti Hai,
Main Kuchh Nahi Kahta Kisi Se Kabhi,
Mujhe Duniya Deewana Kyu Kahti Hai….

st: Meri Rooh Bhi Shayad Bhatkegi Duniya Mein,
s:
Meri Rooh Bhi Shayad Bhatkegi Duniya Mein,
Suna Hai Pyar Karne Waale Marte Nahi Kabhi,

Kya Karenge Ji Kar Hum Bun Yaar Ke Khuda,
Dekh Marne Se Bhi Dilwale Darte Nahi Kabhi…

st: Kuchh Der Aur Agar Aap Thahar Jaate,
s:
Kuchh Der Aur Agar Aap Thahar Jaate,
Toh Dil Ke Armaan Main Pure Kar Leta,
Aankhon Mein Basakar Kar Leta Band Inko,
Fir Hanskar Sabke Sitam Jar Leta….

st: Sab Kuchh Bhulaya Uski Yaad Mein,
s:
Sab Kuchh Bhulaya Uski Yaad Mein,
Khud Ko Bhi Mitaya Uski Yaad Mein,

Agar Hai Kuchh Baki Toh Sirf Yaad Uski,
Khud Ko Kabr Mein Sulaya Uski Yaad Mein…

st: Tab Usko Mera Hi Khyal Aayega,
s:
Tab Usko Mera Hi Khyal Aayega,
Dekhna Wafa Ka Jab Bhi Sawal Aayega,
Magar Zindagi Ki Kabhi Woh Sham Hogi,
Tab Mujhko Us Khuda Par Malal Aayega….

st: Aap Aayenge Kab Talak Itna Toh Bata Dijiye,
s:
Aap Aayenge Kab Talak Itna Toh Bata Dijiye,
Aap Ke Intezaar Mein Kkhud Ko Bhulaye Baithe Hain,

Wapas Ja Na Paoge Bas Ek Baar Chale Aao,
Aapki Raahon Mein Hum Palkein Bichhye Baithe Hain…

st: Aap Aayenge Kab Talak Itna Toh Bata Dijiye,
s:
Aap Aayenge Kab Talak Itna Toh Bata Dijiye,
Aap Ke Intezaar Mein Kkhud Ko Bhulaye Baithe Hain,

Wapas Ja Na Paoge Bas Ek Baar Chale Aao,
Aapki Raahon Mein Hum Palkein Bichhye Baithe Hain…

st: Kya Lena Mujhko Duniya Se,
s:
Kya Lena Mujhko Duniya Se,
Mujhe Tujhse Hi Bas Kaam Hai,

Tere Dil Ki Mujhko Khabar Nahi,
Mere Dil Mein Bas Tera Naam Hai…

st: Woh Mujhko Rulakar Hans Diya,
s:
Woh Mujhko Rulakar Hans Diya,
Mera Dil Thukrakar Hans Diya,

Meri Jholi Bhar Kar Kaanto Se,
Mujhe Paas Bithakar Hans Diya…

st: Main Khush Hun Teri Di Zindagi Se Khuda,
s:
Main Khush Hun Teri Di Zindagi Se Khuda,
Mujh Jaisa Sabko Ghar Sansar Mile,
Jaisa Mujhko Diya Hai Aaj Mere Mola,
Aisa Jeevan Mein Sabko Pyar Mile…

st: Aapne Diye The Jo Pyar Ke Lamhe,
s:
Aapne Diye The Jo Pyar Ke Lamhe,
Un Lamhon Ka Karz Chuka Na Paayenge,
Aapne Bhale Bhula Diya Hi Hamein,
Magar Hum Kabhi Bhi Bhula Na Paayenge…

st: Kismat Se Apni Sabko Sikayat Kyu Hoti Hai,
s:
Kismat Se Apni Sabko Sikayat Kyu Hoti Hai,
Jo Nahi Milta Usi Se Mohabbat Kyu Hoti Hai,

Kitne Khade Rahte Hain Raahon Mein Dil Ki, Fir Bhi,
Dil Ko Usi Ki Mohabbat Kyu Hoti Hai…

st: Jab Mohabbat Ki Daastan Dil Sunayega,
s:
Jab Mohabbat Ki Daastan Dil Sunayega,
Humko Koi Bichhuda Sathi Yaad Aayega,

Hum Bhool Jaayenge Zindagi Ke Ghamon Ko,
Jab Saath Gujra Vakt Yaad Aayega…

st: Chand Taaron Ki Hamein Jarurat Nahi,
s:
Chand Taaron Ki Hamein Jarurat Nahi,
Humko Toh Bas Aapka Pyar Chahiye,
Aur Kuchh Nahi Mangunga Aapse Kabhi,
Pyar Ki Dolat Bas Besumar Chahiye….

st: Ab Toh Hansna Bhi Raaas Nahi Aata,
s:
Ab Toh Hansna Bhi Raaas Nahi Aata,
Hanste Hanste Bhi Aansu Chhalak Aate Hain,

Main Khud Nahi Jaanta , Kyun Mere Mola,
Mujhe Gham Hi Kyun Sada Itne Bhate Hain….

st: Dekhte Hi Dekhte Yeh Zindagi Gujar Jaayegi,
s:
Dekhte Hi Dekhte Yeh Zindagi Gujar Jaayegi,
Jo Ghadiya Beet Chuki Hain Dubara Nahi Aayengi,

Kah Toh Diya Ke Bhool Jaayenge Tum Ko,
Jaanta Hun Magar Unki Yaad Bahut Tadpayengi…

st: Woh Sangdil Hain, Harjaai Hain, Yeh Hum Bhi Jaante Hain,
s:
Woh Sangdil Hain, Harjaai Hain, Yeh Hum Bhi Jaante Hain,
Woh Duniya Mein Sab Se Bura  Hai Yeh Hum Bhi Jaante Hain,

In Buraiyon Ke Baavjood Bhi Poojate Hain Unko,
Kya Karein Majbur Hain Dil Se Use Khuda Mante Hain…

st: Tere Bina Main Kuchh Bhi Nahi,
s:
Tere Bina Main Kuchh Bhi Nahi,
Tere Saath Hi Sab Baharein Hain,
Jo Teri Baahein Hain Hamdam,
Sagar Ke Yahi Toh Kinare Hain…

st: Chup Rahkar Bhi Kya Karte,
s:
Chup Rahkar Bhi Kya Karte,
Aaj Bol Diya Ki Pyar Hai,

Ab Hoga Jo Woh Dekh Jaayega,
Ab Kah Diya Ki Akrar Hai…

st: Ishq Chhupta Hai Chhupane Se Kahan,
s:
Ishq Chhupta Hai Chhupane Se Kahan,
Yeh Khud Be Khud Samne Aata Hai,

Nahi Bachta Is Se Koi Bhi Kabhi,
Yeh Sab Ko Hi Bada Tadpata Hai…

st: Tere Jaane Ke Baad Sanam Mere,
s:
Tere Jaane Ke Baad Sanam Mere,
Sochta Hun Ke Kaise Jiyunga Main,

Tujhse Kiya Hai Isi Liye Wada,
Yeh Judai Ka Zahar Bhi Piyunga Main….
